divs: Sighting DetailsI went outside to have a smoke. As usual i was staring at the sky. I looked up to see a star like object traversing the sky. I watched it just glide across the sky. NO acceleration or movement really. I went inside to grab the binoculars to get a better look at the thing. When observed from a "closer" range, it appeared solid white. When i looked at it when it was further away, it looked almost like an orange pink color. I thought to myself that it had to be a satellite. I eventually lost sight of it after about 5-6 minutes. Just to note, there was ALOT of traffic in the sky. It seemed to me they were putting in alot of chemtrail work.
trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Warren
There were no other sightings in Warren on or around November 28th 2009
